column2: "It's really unusual for a large-scale fire to break out in the residential district like this!"
"According to eyewitnesses, a green, shiny substance appeared during the battle, then suddenly ignited all at once."
"...A green, shiny substance? What could it be? Not right now! We've got to provide relief from the fire!"
"I'm begging you, take this \"Rescue Gun\" to put out the fires and help the people who couldn't get away!"
